thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: THI
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by THI

author: THI
title: THI
text: The Japan Rail Pass makes it very easy to travel around especially in Tokyo where most lines accept the JR Pass. The process to cross gates was fast (a quick show of the pass at the gate) and efficient. Obtaining the pass at the airport was very straightforward and is cost effective if traveling via the Shinkansen outside Tokyo. I would recommend it to anyone looking to go on holiday in Japan. The only downside is that it has limited use in certain areas.
